list.head: Challenges {extension}
list.title: FLOAT Challenges
list.no-challege: There is no any FLOAT Challenge.

create.head: Creating a new FLOAT Challenge {extension}
create.name: Challenge Name
create.preset-title: Select the FLOATs you want to be a part of your challenge

summary.collect-more: Please collect more FLOATs of the Challenge

goal.title: Add a new goal →
goal.select-by-amount-desc: Achieve by collecting amount of FLOATs in current challenge.
goal.select-by-percent-desc: Achieve by collecting percentage of FLOATs in current challenge.
goal.select-by-specifics-desc: Achieve by collecting some specific FLOATs incurrent challenge.

strategy.title: Add a new strategy →
strategy.select-queue-desc: Eligible users can claim reward one by one, till all rewards claimed.
strategy.select-raffle-desc: Eligible users will get a ticket to join the raffle and only winners can claim rewards.
strategy.select-identical-amt-desc: Distribute Fungible Token with same amount for each claimer.
strategy.select-random-amt-desc: Distribute Fungible Token with random amount within a total amount.
strategy.select-nft-deliver-desc: Distribute one share of NFT reward to each claimer.
strategy.label-min-valid-users: Minimum Amount of Eligible Users for the Raffle: {amount}

treasury.title: Manage the treasury →
treasury.select-deposit-ft-desc: Deposit any Fungible Tokens to the treasury of current Challenge.
treasury.select-deposit-nft-desc: Deposit any NFTs to the treasury of current Challenge.
treasury.select-drop-desc: Drop ALL assets in the treasury and transfer to owner's account.

cert.title: Manage Certificates →
cert.select-generate-desc: Generate a specific certificate code which can be configured in FLOAT creation.
cert.select-sync-desc: Sync related FLOATs as Certificates of the Challenge.

common.fields-missing: The following mandatory fields are missing

challenges.slot-required: Challenge need one slot at least.
challenges.not-eligible-user-need-points: You are not eligible, please obtain more POINTS.
challenges.wait-for-claimable: Please wait for the CLAIMABLE phase
challenges.not-eligible-to-claim: You are not eligible to claim the reward.
challenges.no-reward-strategy: There is no reward strategy for the Challenge
challenges.no-related-cert-float: There is no related challenge certificate FLOAT in this account

events.account-no-events: This account has not created any FLOAT events yet.

verifier.label-challenge-false-desc: This FLOAT is not a challenge certificate.
verifier.label-challenge-true-desc: This FLOAT is a challenge certificate, You need to reach certain achievement points to claim.

hint.enter-cert-code: Enter a certificate code generated in Challenge Settings

detail.section-info-cert-desc: This FLOAT requires a minimium achievement points of {n} for the Challenge to claim.
